SA10n1075:9: tatra vartamānamātmabhāvamapekṣya atītā ātmabhāvāḥ pūrvānta ityucyate |
SA10n1075:13: pratītyasamutpādasya yathāvadavasthitatattvadarśanāt nānyathāvasthitaṃ vastu anyathā abhiniviśate |
SA10n1075:14: tatra aṣṭau dṛṣṭayaḥ pūrvāntamālambya anyathā pravṛttāḥ | tadyathā -
SA10n1075:29: tatra yadyapi pūrvāntād dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayāduttaraṃ dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayaṃ nātibhidyate,
SA10n1075:35: athavā ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ - yacchāśvato lokaḥ ityeṣāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sāmānyena pūrvāntamāśritā |
SA10n1075:37: ityeṣā tu ātmana eva pūrvāntaparāmarśena pravṛttā,
SA10n1075:40: ityevaṃ tāvat aṣṭāvetā dṛṣṭayaḥ pūrvāntaṃ samupāśritāḥ ||1 ||
SA10n1075:43: tatra vartamāna mātmabhāvamapekṣya bhāvinaḥ ātmabhāvāḥ aparānta ityucyate |
SA10n1075:49: tatra aṣṭau dṛṣṭayaḥ aparāntamālambya anyathā pravṛttāḥ | tadyathā -
SA10n1075:57: naiva bhaviṣyāmi na ca na bhaviṣyāmyanāgatamadhvānam,
SA10n1075:59: kimetā eva catasro dṛṣṭayaḥ aparāntaṃ samāśritāḥ? netyāha |
SA10n1075:60: kiṃ tarhi aparā api catasro vidyante antādyā aparāntaṃ samāśritāḥ |
SA10n1075:61: tatra antādyāścatasro dṛṣṭayaḥ sāmānyena aparāntamāaśritya pravṛttāḥ,
SA10n1075:62: kiṃ tu bhaviṣyāmyanāgatamadhvānamityetāstu ātmana evāparāntamāśritya pravṛttāḥ,
SA10n1075:64: tatra ādyasya tāvat pūrvāntālambikasya dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayasya yathā na saṃbhavaḥ,
SA10n1075:67: yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu sa eva na bhavatyayam ||3 ||
SA10n1075:68: tatra ya eva atīteṣu janmasu babhūva,
SA10n1075:74: iha hi pūrvaṃ yadi narakādigatiko bhūtvā idānīṃ karmavaicitryāt manuṣyeṣu upapannaḥ evaṃkalpayet - ahamevāsau nāraka āsam iti ,
SA10n1075:76: kathaṃ hi nāma manuṣyaḥ san nārakādikaḥ syāt?
SA10n1075:77: yattarhi idaṃ paṭhayate sūtre - ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena māndhātā nāma rājā cakravartī abhūvam iti,
SA10n1075:80: ata eva hi nānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayeneti paṭhayate |
SA10n1075:81: yadi punaḥ sa evāyamiti pūrvakasya cādhunātanasya ca ekatvaṃ syāt,
SA10n1075:86: yadi sa eva pūrvaka ātmāyamidānīṃ syāt,
SA10n1075:87: tadā upādānasya pañcaskandhalakṣaṇasya viśeṣo na syāt upādāturaviśeṣātpūrvāvasthāyāmiva |
SA10n1075:89: kiṃ tarhi viśiṣyata eva upādānamupādātuḥ karmabhedāt kārakabhedācca |
SA10n1075:90: tataśca upādānaviśeṣāt sa evāyamātmeti na yujyate ||
SA10n1075:98: na caitad bhedena darśayituṃ śakyam - ayamasāvātmā,
SA10n1075:102: yadā caivamupādānavinirmukta ātmā darśayituṃ na śakyate,
SA10n1075:103: tadā upādānaviśeṣe'pi ātmāviśeṣa iti na śakyate kalpayitum ||4 ||
SA10n1075:110: yathā tāvadupādānamevātmā na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha -
SA10n1075:115: na caivamātmā pratikṣaṇamutpadyate ca vinaśyati ca |
SA10n1075:116: ātmā skandhebhyastattvānyatvādinā ca nityānityatvenāpyaśakya eva vaktum,
SA10n1075:122: api ca - kathaṃ hi nāmopādānamupādātā bhaviṣyati |
SA10n1075:128: na caitad dṛṣṭaṃ yuktaṃ vā iti pratipādayannāha -
SA10n1075:132: kiṃ tarhi upādānavyatirikta eva ātmā bhaviṣyati |
SA10n1075:136: gṛhyate hyanupādāno yadyanyo na ca gṛhyate || 7 ||
SA10n1075:147: atha syāt - yadi ātmā upādānasvarūpo na bhavati,
SA10n1075:150: sa hi anyo'pi na bhavati upādānamanapekṣya bhedena grahaṇaprasaṅgāt |
SA10n1075:157: na hi avidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ skandhānupādāya prajñapyate |
SA10n1075:158: kathaṃ sati upādāne upādātā nāstīti yujyate |
SA10n1075:162: ihāpi ca pūrvameva sthānasthāneṣu kṛtā vyavastheti na punariha tadvayavasthāne yatna āsthīyate ||8 ||
SA10n1075:164: idānīṃ nābhūvamatītamadhvāna mityedapi yathā nopapadyate tathā pratipādayannāha -
SA10n1075:166: yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu tato'nyo na bhavatyayam ||9 ||
SA10n1075:167: yadi pūrvakādātmanaḥ asya adhunātanasya ātmano'nyatvaṃ syāt,
SA10n1075:171: yadi punaḥ pūrvakādātmanaḥ asya anyatvaṃ syāt,
SA10n1075:173: yadi hyayaṃ bhavedanyaḥ pratyākhyāyāpi taṃ bhavet |
SA10n1075:174: tathaiva ca sa saṃtiṣṭhettatra jāyeta vāmṛtaḥ ||10 ||
SA10n1075:175: yadi hi ayamadhunātana ātmā pūrvakādātmanaḥ anyaḥ syāt,
SA10n1075:176: tadā taṃ pūrvakamātmānaṃ pratyākhyāya parityajya tannirapekṣaḥ ataddhetuka eva syāt |
SA10n1075:178: tathaiva ca sa saṃtiṣṭhettatra yadi pūrvakādātmanaḥ asya anyatvaṃ syāt,
SA10n1075:179: tadā anyatvād ghaṭotpāde paṭāvināśavat pūrvasyātmanā uttarasminnapi ātmani samutpadyamāne'pi anirodhaḥ syāt |
SA10n1075:180: aniruddhatvācca yatra pūrvaṃ devamanuṣyādi janmasu upapannaḥ,
SA10n1075:182: tenaiva prakāreṇa tathaiva sa tatrāvatiṣṭheta tathaivāvatiṣṭheteti |
SA10n1075:185: yadi hyayaṃ bhavedanyaḥ pratyākhyāyāpi taṃ bhavet |
SA10n1075:186: iti , yadi puna pūrvakamātmānaṃ pratyākhyāya [ ayamiha bhavet,
SA10n1075:195: iha ca anyasyaiva cotpādanātpūrvakasyātmana ucchedaḥ syāt |
SA10n1075:198: atha pūrvakenātmanā kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ uttareṇātmanā phalaparibhogaḥ parikalpyate,
SA10n1075:199: tathāpi anyena kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalasya anyenopabhogaḥ syāt | tataśca -
SA10n1075:202: api ca | yadi ayamātmā pūrvakādātmanaḥ anya eva atropapannaḥ syāt,
SA10n1075:207: iti | yadi hi ātmā pūrvamabhūtvā paścādutpannaḥ syāt,
SA10n1075:211: vyatiriktasya ca tanniṣpādakasya karturabhāvāt kutaḥ kṛtakatvamātmano yojyeta?
SA10n1075:212: kṛtake cātmani parikalpyamāne ādimān saṃsāraḥ syādeva,
SA10n1075:219: pūrvaṃ hi ātmā nāstīti akṛtako nirhetukaḥ syāt |
SA10n1075:221: kṛtako vā bhavedātmā yadi vā nābhūvamatīta madhvānamityetannābhyupeyam |
SA10n1075:228: evaṃ yathopavarṇitena nyāyena abhūmatītamadhvānamiti yā dṛṣṭiḥ,
SA10n1075:233: ekaikasya ca pṛthakpṛthagabhāvāt kutastatsamāhāra iti ubhayamapi na saṃbhavati |
SA10n1075:236: tadevaṃ pūrvāntaṃ samāśritasya dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayasya asaṃbhavamudbhāvya idānīmaparāntasamāśritasya pratiṣedhamāha -
SA10n1075:242: aiṣyajanmani yo bhāvo sa eva na bhavatyayam ||
SA10n1075:246: aiṣya janmani yo bhāvo tato'nyo na bhavatyayam ||
SA10n1075:249: sa devaḥ sa manuṣyaścedevaṃ bhavati śāśvatam |
SA10n1075:250: anutpannaśca devaḥ syājjāyate na hi śāśvatam ||15 ||
SA10n1075:251: iha hi kaścinmanuṣyagatisthaḥ kuśalaṃ karma kṛtvā devagatiṃ gacchati |
SA10n1075:252: tatra yadi sa eva devaḥ sa eva manuṣya iti evamubhayoraikyaṃ syāt,
SA10n1075:254: na caitadevaṃ yadeva eva manuṣyo bhavediti |
SA10n1075:265: idānīmaśāśvatamapi yathā na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha -
SA10n1075:268: yadi hi anyo devo'nyaśca manuṣyaḥ syāt,
SA10n1075:269: tadā pūrvakasya manuṣyātmanastatra naṣṭatvādiha ca anyasyaivotpādāt sa pūrvako manuṣyātmā tatra vinaṣṭa ityaśāśvataṃ syāt |
SA10n1075:273: tadā yathā nimbasya na āmratarusaṃtāno bhavati,
SA10n1075:274: evaṃ manuṣyasya devaḥ ekasaṃtānapatito na syāt |
SA10n1075:278: asti ceyaṃ saṃtānānuvṛttiḥ devasya manuṣyaḥ ekasaṃtānapatita iti |
SA10n1075:279: tasmāt saṃtānābhāvaprasaṅgāt devādanyo manuṣyo na bhavati |
SA10n1075:284: aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca bhavettacca na yujyate ||17 ||
SA10n1075:285: yadi ayaṃ manuṣyaḥ aṃśena manuṣyatāṃ vijahyāt,
SA10n1075:289: etacca ayuktaṃ yadekasya divyagatisaṃgṛhītaḥ ekadeśaḥ syāt,
SA10n1075:291: tasmācchāśvataṃ ca aśāśvataṃ ca etadubhayaṃ nopapadyate ||17 ||
SA10n1075:302: atha syāt - anādijanmamaraṇaparaṃparāpravṛttamavicchinnakamaṃ saṃsāraprabandhamupalabhya śāśvata mātmānaṃ parikalpayāmaḥ |
SA10n1075:304: yo hi nāma evamanādimati saṃsāre paribhramannadyāpyupalabhyate iti |
SA10n1075:309: yadi tasmādanādistu saṃsāraḥ syānna cāsti saḥ ||19 ||
SA10n1075:310: yadi hi saṃskārāṇāmātmano va kutaścidgatyantarād gamanaṃ gatyantaramāgamanaṃ syāt,
SA10n1075:311: tataśca gantyantarāt punaḥ kkacid gamanaṃ syāt,
SA10n1075:315: na cāpi itaḥ punaḥ kasyacit kkacid gamanaṃ saṃbhavati,
SA10n1075:318: tadā kuto janmamaraṇaparaṃparāyā atidīrghatvena ādyanupalambhādanādimān saṃsāraḥ syāt?
SA10n1075:319: saṃsarturabhāvāt kutaḥ anādimattvamādimatvaṃ vā saṃsārasya saṃbhavet?
SA10n1075:322: yo hi nāma evamanādimati saṃsāre paribhramannadyāpyupalabhyate iti,
SA10n1075:327: yadā caivaṃ śāśvata eva padārtho na saṃbhavati,
SA10n1075:330: tasmādevaṃ śāśvatādidṛṣṭicatuṣṭayaṃ pūrvānte saṃsārasya na saṃbhavati ||20 ||
SA10n1075:333: antavān yadi lokaḥ syātparalokaḥ kathaṃ bhavet |
SA10n1075:337: tadā paraloko na syāt asti ca paraloka iti antavāṃlloka iti nopapadyate |
SA10n1075:343: idānīmantavattvamanantavatvaṃ ca ubhayametallokasya yathā na saṃbhavati,
SA10n1075:358: atha yadi pūrvakāḥ skandhā na naśyeṣuḥ ,
SA10n1075:359: tān pratītya uttare phalabhūtāḥ skandhā notpadyeran tadā ananto'vināśī lokaḥ syāt svarūpādapracyutatvāt |
SA10n1075:360: yadā tu pūrvakāḥ skandhā nirudhyante taddhetukāścāpare skandhā uttarakālaṃ jāyante,
SA10n1075:370: ataḥ antavāṃśca anantavāṃśca loka iti na yujyate ||25 ||
SA10n1075:371: kasmāt punarekadeśasya vināśaḥ ekadeśasya cāvasthānaṃ na yujyate iti pratipādayannāha -
SA10n1075:373: na naṅkṣyate caikadeśa evaṃ caitanna yujyate ||26 ||
SA10n1075:374: iha ekadeśasya vināśe ekadeśasya cāvasthāne parikalpyamāne yadi vā upādātu rekadeśasya vināśaḥ avasthānaṃ vā parikalpyeta,
SA10n1075:376: tatra yadi tāvadupādātu rekadeśasya vināśaḥ ekadeśasya cāvasthānaṃ parikalpyate,
SA10n1075:381: naiva hi atra kācidupapattirasti yayā ekadeśasya vināśamekadeśasya cāvināśaṃ parikalpayiṣyāmaḥ |
SA10n1075:385: sa ca skandheṣu pañcadhā mṛgyamāṇo na saṃbhavati |
SA10n1075:389: ata evāha - evaṃ caitanna yujyate iti |
SA10n1075:390: athavā yadi upādāturekadeśo naśyedekadeśaśca na naśyet,
SA10n1075:392: na caitadiṣyate ityāha - evaṃ caitanna yujyate iti |
SA10n1075:394: idānīmupādānasyāpi yathā na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha -
SA10n1075:398: tadevamubhayadarśanāsaṃbhavaṃ pratipādya idānīṃ yathā nobhayamapi na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha -
SA10n1075:402: ataḥ antavattve ca anantavattve ca ubhayasminnapratīte kasya pratiṣedhena naivāntavān nānantavān lokaḥ iti dṛṣṭisaṃbhavaḥ syāditi ||28 ||
SA10n1075:403: evaṃ tāvat sāṃvṛtaṃ pratibimbākāramupādātāramupādānaṃ cābhyupetyāpi śāśvatādidṛṣṭayasaṃbhavaṃ pratipādya idānīṃ sarvathā bhāvasvabhāvānupalambhena bandhyāputraśyāmagauratādivat śāśvatādidṛṣṭīnāmasaṃbhavaṃ pratipipādayiṣurāha -
SA10n1075:406: iha sarvabhāvānāṃ pratītyasamutpannatvāt śūnyatvaṃ sakalena śāstreṇa pratipāditam |
SA10n1075:407: tataśca sarvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvāt katamāstāḥ sarvabhāvabāhyāḥ śāśvatādyā dṛṣṭayo bhaviṣyanti,
SA10n1075:409: tathā kiṃ vā ālambanaṃ yat sarvabhāvānantargataṃ yatraitā dṛṣṭaya utpatsyante yatraitā dṛṣṭīrnivārayiṣyāmaḥ?
SA10n1075:410: katamaścāsau bhāvaḥ pudgalo vā sarvabhāvabāhyāḥ yasyaitā dṛṣṭayaḥ utpatsyante yaṃ dṛṣṭibhyo nivārayiṣyāmaḥ ?
SA10n1075:411: kiṃ vā dṛṣṭīnāmutpattikāraṇamālambana - nimittaṃ sarvabhāvabāhyaṃ yasmānnimittādutpadyamānāḥ śāśvatādikāḥ dṛṣṭīḥ vārayiṣyāmaḥ?
SA10n1075:413: śūnyatvācca sarve eva hi te padārthā nopalabhyanta iti ,
SA10n1075:419: asaṃbhave ca sati āsāṃ parikalpanaiva notpadyate ityayuktā evaitā dṛṣṭayaḥ ||29 ||
SA10n1075:430: prapañcopaśamaṃ śivaṃ pratītyasamutpādasaṃjñayā hi deśitavān sarvadṛṣṭiprahāṇārthaṃ jagatāmanukampāmupādāya mahākaruṇāmevāśritya priyaikaputrādhikatarapremapātrasakalatribhuvanajanaḥ na lābhasatkārapratyupakārādi lipsayā,
SA10n1075:435: ya imaṃ pratītyasamutpādamevaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā satatasamitamajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvada viparītamajātamabhūtamakṛtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanāvaraṇaṃ śivamabhayamanāhāryamavyayamavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati asatastucchataḥ riktato'sārato rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato'ghato'nityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato'nātmataḥ,
SA10n1075:441: aparāntaṃ vā punarna pratisarati kiṃ nvahaṃ bhaviṣyāmyanāgate'dhvani,
SA10n1075:445: pratyutpannaṃ vā punarna pratisarati kiṃ nvidaṃ kathaṃ nvidaṃ ke santaḥ ke bhaviṣyāmaḥ ayaṃ sattvaḥ kutaṃ āgataḥ,
SA10n1075:446: sa itaścyutaḥ kutra gamiṣyatīti yānyekeṣāṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ pṛthagloke dṛṣṭigatāni bhaviṣyanti tadyathā - ātmavādapratisaṃyuktāni jīvavādapratisaṃyuktāni kautukamaṅgalapratisaṃyuktāni,
SA10n1075:447: tānyasya tasmin samaye prahīṇāni bhavanti parijñātāni samucchinnamūlāni tālamastakavadanābhāsagatāni āyatyāmanutpādānirodhadharmāṇi | |
SA10n1075:448: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhāṣitamabhinandya anupramodya utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ,
